name: Cthulhu Rises
description:
Take on the role of Cthulhu and show the world you are the Only One.

  • Click on life boats to gain a portal and +health.
  • Once a portal is summoned click on the screen to throw a comet from your portal.
  • Deflect enemy projectiles with your comets.
  • Defeat the the Boss to win.

Design, Code, Graphics, Music all done by ONLY ONE person.
